Date: 19 Oct 2021

Capacitance: 32.7uF external measured, 1.5uF on-board rated, so ~34uF system capacitance
Manual reading: 194mV 
V_start 3.012V, V_end 2.818V, stable, no variation (<5mV scope precision)
